Html:
Hi,

Great project.  I noticed that nerddinner.com had an iPhone and Blackberry mobile version.  Will those updates be released? 

Thank in advance,
- Ben

Probably later this week. I need to tidy up the code.

On Tue, Mar 31, 2009 at 7:37 AM, quest4denali <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: quest4denali

Hi,

Great project.  I noticed that nerddinner.com had an iPhone and Blackberry mobile version.  Will those updates be released? 

Thank in advance,

Great, I look forward to how the mobile sections were implemented.  Excellent book, project, and podcast btw.

Best Regards,
- Ben
sorry to bother you about it, but any new info about the mobile version ? I am curious to check it out.  thanks !

I checked awhile ago and Scott Hanselman, had checked in the mobile updates.  This is available under the "Source Code" tab.  Just go to the latest entry and download.

You'll also notice browser file has been updated to include the latest drop.

Hope this helps.

- Ben
